name: Wizard Garden
description:
Help the Wizard grow his garden.  Protect it from animals that would like to eat it. The Video Game version is single player and the Card Game version is multiplayer. 

I made all the assets, One of the background songs I made before the Game Jam.

Note:

(The Video Game version is not compleat, I need to give the player  more Cards when they harvest a crop, because right now they don't give you enough to do anything with, so you can't get very far in the game, I will upload a non game Jam version of it to fix it )
